hi im barkat, the cat that barks,

Yo, it's dev. My cat literally barked the other night in front of my girl so I
decided to make the $BKAT token to honor him.

If you want to know exactly how it went down you can click here.

He's usually busy watching the charts but if you want, you can chat with him.

Hop on the spaceship and let's ride together.

PS - he identifies as a jeet sometimes.

H0w t0 buy

Create a Wallet

Download Metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play
store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going
to metamask.io.

Get S0me ETH

Have ETH in your wallet to switch to $BKAT. If you don’t have any ETH, you can
buy directly on Metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another
exchange and send it to your wallet.

G0 t0 Uniswap

Go to app.uniswap.org or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your
wallet. Paste the $BKAT token address into Uniswap, select $BKAT, and confirm.
When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.

get s0me barkat

Swap ETH for $BKAT. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying
with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times
of market volatility.

r0admap

PHASE 1

Launch the $BKAT token on Uniswap DEX.

Build a strong community and spread the word about Barkat through various
social media platforms.

Get people excited by hosting events and social gatherings.

PHASE 2

Partner with pet-related businesses to help pets in need.

Create an app where people can use Barkat for fun activities.

Work with other meme tokens to help each other grow and spread awareness.

PHASE 3

Get Barkat listed on more platforms and exchanges so the token is readily
available to larger audiences.

Create the Barkat Dao so our amazing holders get a vote in choosing the future
of Barkat and any future revenue generating services.

$BKAT has no intrinsic value or expectation of financial return. This token is
for entertainment purposes only. Bork!
